thread.title: Kristy Estabine

author: Kristy Estabine
title: Kristy Estabine
text:
I've used Sign-up Genius for years to coordinate so many events. I've been a Room-Mom (party coordinator) for my kiddos' classrooms since 2007. My first year, I used email to try and coordinate - what a confusing, time consuming mess. I then found Sign-Up Genius and it was like I found a personal assistant. I was able to have the fun in planning the party and then I would set up the invitation and list of items and volunteers needed, send out the invite to the parents and I was done.
I have used the Sign-up to create classroom "Gift Registries", Conference Meals for teachers. School Movie Night volunteer shift schedules and so much more. A huge thank you to the Sign-up Genius team for creating such a wonderful tool.
